website_summaries.verdict: Though it's not gold or silver, it's well made and pretty, and more likely than some competitors to stand up to daily wear.
pros: Stands out for its surgical stainless steel workmanship that is attractive and durable
cons: Links are attractive, but have the tendency to catch on some materials

customer_reviews.title: This is completely risk free... seriously!
customer_reviews.text: I have some hefty ankles, and when this anklet arrived it was about a half an inch too small. The seller had emailed to ask how I liked it and I said I did very much, but would have to return it as it didn't fit. They asked if I would instead like to keep it and get a free extender from them. A few days later a package arrived, containing a pretty box with TWO necklace length chains with extenders! The chains themselves are bright, delicate (but not flimsy), and really pretty. I would absolutely buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: D. Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I wanted something to decorate my left foot since my other foot is tattooed and this is just right for me :) I may have over estimated my ankle size, so it's a tad longer than I'd prefer but that's my bad. lol
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: BEST ANKLET EVER!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE! I think about how much I LOVE this anklet on a daily basis... no joke! It is very strong yet sparkling and feminine. I've kept this on everyday, through the swimming pool, ocean, bathing.... and it stays beautiful! I've even recommended this anklet to my friends at work (who are also chronic accidental anklet breakers, like me!). If you love anklets but hate them breaking or discoloring, then let me reassure you that this is one anklet that will not break your heart! I definitely recommend this anklet, and want to thank the jewelers for designing this lovely little gem!
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good fit at 9 inches
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and feminine. I got the size nine inches and it fits. I am slightly overweight, so it is a little snug but I like tha it’s smaller because it sits up a bit higher and in my opinion it looks better higher.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Thank You so much, i have size 11 ankles ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank You so much, i have size 11 ankles and it's always hard to find an anklet that fits. simple but cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ainfires

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and durable anklet/bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice anklet. We wanted something durable and attractive to hold a small charm. Mrs. wears it 24/7, so it needed to handle lake water, showers, etc. This anklet seems to be just what we wanted. Time will definitely tell, but as of now...we are 100% happy with this purchase. When we reached out to ask some questions, the excellent customer service was a breath of fresh air.
customer_reviews.author: nunyo bidnez

customer_reviews.title: Thin but cute
customer_reviews.text: It's thinner than I expected, but it's still cute. I have worn it every day, even have slept with it on and showered. It hasn't broken or been damaged. Not sure what others are doing to it that it breaks "easily" but as long as you take care of it and don't tug on it, I don't see why there should be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Irene V.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece. My wife is always breaking her ankle bracelets. I was about to order a white gold replacement for the silver one she just recently broke, but found this here on Amazon. I figured I'd give it a try. We live in Guam and have a pool at the house as well, so chlorine and ocean would've caused constant tarnishing. I went with this for that reason and also for the added strength of steel. It looks just as pretty as a silver or white gold piece. We'll see how it holds up after its been on her ankle, but so far, I would highly recommend...especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: I received my ankle bracelet today and it far exceeded my expectations, the picture does not do this justice. It is well made, shiny and just beautiful. I wanted something sturdy that I would not have to worry about losing when swimming or doing summer activities with the kids. I need to remove a few links so I emailed the seller to ask a question about it - he responded to my email the same day. I would highly recommend buying from this seller - I plan to purchase more ankle bracelets for my daughters and the matching infinity link necklace for myself. Thank you for providing a quality product at such an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: JessE

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, delicate looking, lovely anklet. The lobster claw clasp is small enough not to be bulky, but easy enough to open and attach. Fits great. Looks great. Light weight. I expect to have it for a long time with no tarnishing or breakage. Stainless steel is so strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with my beautiful and delicate anklet!
customer_reviews.text: Received this bracelet a couple days late because the post person delivered it to the wrong house. Didn't think I'd get it back but I am so happy they were honest because it is beautiful and delicate! I really wanted a stainless steel one as I am very hard on jewelry! Included in the nice packaging were little plastic storage bags and some earring backs that I can also use! Thank you I am thrilled with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: toocooltoshop

customer_reviews.title: Lovely piece of jewelry & super company.
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel anklet is delicate yet sturdy. Seems like I'll be enjoying this piece for a long time to come. Beautiful thing about stainless steel is that it will not tarnish or rust, plus, it's strong. The people who make these seem down to earth and were very helpful and timely in answer to my query. If you are looking for a lovely, lasting anklet...this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: Great quality anklet!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I was worried that it would be too skinny but it's perfect. I could've ordered a smaller length but it still works great for me. I've worn it in the shower and bath and had no problems. I do take it off when I work out because it rubs a little during my work out but that probably would not happen if I ordered one size smaller for a more snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dnjc

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Anklet arrived today. 9 inch fits beautifully (only a little loose) - but I have very small ankles. I was surprised how lightweight and dainty it is. Super pretty. Very feminine. I’m ordering another one for sure!
customer_reviews.author: BeachyKeen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality anklet! It fits perfectly and is nice and shiny! It has a strong clasp and is sturdy even though it looks dainty. It even came with a mini jewelry emergency kit! This company has vastly surpassed my expectations and I will definitely do business with them again!
customer_reviews.author: JgoffTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for a little ankle bracelet. Not too large, feels very light on. I certainly buy again. Has a little sparkle to it because of the link catching and reflecting the light.
customer_reviews.author: Bosan44

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful anklet, the only reason durability wasn’t mentioned is because I just received it. It is lovely.. I’ve not had much luck with anklets in the past, so I am hoping this one will ..
customer_reviews.author: happy consumer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little anklet
customer_reviews.text: Lovely anklet but appears fragile and is a little short...l bought my usual size but it barely fits..l added several links as an extender and l'm wearing it but not sure how durable it will be...we'll see

customer_reviews.title: So long sterling silver
customer_reviews.text: I like stainless steel so much better than sterling silver. I don't have to worry about the dullness and I never have to worry about cleaning stainless steel like with silver!
customer_reviews.author: Layvba

customer_reviews.title: too tiny and not noticeable on the ankle
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to recommend this anklet. It is too small (2mm); hardly visible on the ankle. It does not sparkle and combined with the size, it does not show well on the ankle. However, it is well made and easy to fasten, but that is about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lyrikal More

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This ankle bracelet is lovely, delicate looking but feels sturdy. Very pretty, very shiny, I’m pleased with my purchase. Just what I’ve been looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my anklet about a year ago. I've worn it EVERYDAY. I never take it off. I shower in it and it looks the same as day one. I'd buy again or even as a gift.

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Was too tight on me. I am only 5foot3 and 130 pounds. For my wrist like a bracelet. BUT It also came with a few jewelry bags and earring backs. Unfortunately I have to return.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful anklet
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sturdy, price is right. I wear an anklet year round, and this one really kept its shine. Interesting design also.

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this ankle bracelet. It’s very pretty. The clasp looks strong too. Also sent was a mini-jewelry survival kit including earring backings and small plastic zippered bags for individual jewelry items. I’m impressed with this company. Thank you for the free extras!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this anklet 24/7 now for 2 months, it's just as shiny as the day it arrived. I receive a lot of compliments, forget it's there until someone mentions it.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price and I ordered the size that stays above my ankle which I love because it doesn't rub against my foot when wearing sandals/shoes/etc. Worn in shower and so far no problems with coloring or breaking.

customer_reviews.title: I loved it! It fits perfect and I wear it ...

feature_bullets: 316L Is the finest Jewelry/Surgical Grade Stainless Steel. All our chains are made with 316L Stainless Steel.
FREE GIFT with each order - You get a Mini Jewelry Survival Kit - special goodies for all your jewelry needs
COMFORTABLE TO WEAR - These were designed specifically for both comfort and durability
ALLERGIES TO NICKEL? - you will be pleasantly surprised - no bad skin reactions - Lead and Nickel free - Hypoallergenic

All Media Productions Jewelry sells for 2 to 5 times our price in Jewelry and Department Stores - BUY yours now while the prices are this low - All our Jewelry is made of the highest quality materials. The BEST for LESS.
